title: Ep 25: Alberto
description: Alberto Hill was sent to prison for a long time for hacking. For a crime he said he did not commit. Listen to his story and you be the judge on whether he's guilty or not.
itunes:title: Alberto
itunes:author: Jack Rhysider
itunes:subtitle: Illegal hacker or security professional?
itunes:summary: Alberto Hill was sent to prison for a long time for hacking. For a crime he said he did not commit. Listen to his story and you be the judge on whether he's guilty or not.
